website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer the aviator style, it's hard to go wrong with these classics –  unless your top priority is a fit that feels lightweight.
pros: Generates praise for the timeless aviator style, super thin polarized lenses, and sturdy metal craftsmanship
Owners love that they offer clear vision with little to no distortion
cons: A few complaints have been logged about their weight – some wearers find them somewhat heavy on the face

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Company - Awesome Sunglasses - Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. I had the same pair for over 10 years. At one point I scratched one of the lenses and sent in to Maui Jim for replacement. I sent the fee in for lenses and a $10 handling fee. When i got them back, there was note in the box from the repair person stating the frame was scratched too so they went ahead and replaced it along with the hinges (new springs) as well no charge as a thanks for being a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake. 100% Fake
customer_reviews.text: To tell if their fake, check the Patent # on the arm. If it isn't 6.145.984, it is fake. The pair I got had a patent number without the periods. Ironically the patent number was a Maui Jim for Lenses. Also the Maui Jim on the lens was sprayed on and not etched. If you have a magnifying glass, it's easy to see. It's too bad. I would have bought 5-10 pair a year. Love Maui Jims. I give them as gifts to our Vacation Renters in Scottsdale.
customer_reviews.author: Rennergizer 3);$4$;74

customer_reviews.title: 1st class!!!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 5th pair of Maui Jum Kahunas. Yep...I usually lose them. I guess most people don't turn these in to lost and found when they find them. The optics are great! The styling is classy yep sporty. Optics are 2nd to none...especially in Florida. I am also getting the bronze pair as well...and I'm sure they will be just as nice. These frames are ideal for a person with a larger face..or wider face. They fit comfortably..and look as they should. Most people with larger heads try and wear smaller sunglasses and they just don't look right. These are super comfortable and not too heavy..so you can wear them for long periods of time without fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: chrt396

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit and UV protection. I have had the Kahuna sunglasses for five years now and they are by far my favorite. I have broken them a couple of times but they were quickly repaired by Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a second pair of these for the car, note that I've had my first pair for 3 years now and they've been from Aruba to Park City, Utah. Only issue is that because they have glass lenses, they start to slip if you sweat a lot (easily solved with some sports bands).
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great shades but downgrade on the accessories
customer_reviews.text: So the 3 star review isn't for the shades. This is my 2nd pair of kahunas so I love them and I also own 2 pairs of castaways. Was disappointed to see that they no longer ship with the higher quality beige colored hard cases or the cleaning pouch. Instead you'll get a cheap folding black case and a thin cleaning cloth. Come on guys quality is what sets you apart from your competitors and that should include the accessories
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: If you want great sunglasses then look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Lightweight. Nice look and feel. Very good overall quality. First time using Maui Jim glasses- the next time I need sunglasses, I'll be certain to buy this brand again. And the shipping and packaging was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great for removing glare and providing contrast in bright sunlight ...
customer_reviews.text: The Maui Jim Kahuna Sunglasses are worth every penny or credit. The fit feels customized and the styling is classy with a touch of rakish. They are great for removing glare and providing contrast in bright sunlight as well as enhancing the environment in overcast conditions. If you like or are accustomed to plastic sunglasses, these may feel heavy and you may be bothered by the nose pads. That aside, once you wear them, you will be converted to island style.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo Miyagi

customer_reviews.title: and they're still good. I can't beat Maui Jim for a product ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this same product 14 years ago.....and they're still good. I can't beat Maui Jim for a product that is/was well developed and last-n-last-n-last. To coin an old phrase....."....it takes a beating and keeps on ticking...." no not a watch but, these classes. Thought I would get another pair just in case. Thank you for a GREAT PRODUCT !!!! Ron.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After wearing Maui Jim sunglasses for years in my 20s, I had regressed to lesser brands for an extended period due to price. What a mistake that was! The minute I put these over my eyes I instantly recalled what it was like to wear top of the line sunglasses. I'll never go back to other brands again. Golf Shack 55's price was quite simply unbeatable and almost unbelievable for these sunglasses, and I am thrilled that I took the chance on them. Delivery was incredibly fast, and the glasses were exactly as described. Overall, a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: The best polarized quality eye wear you can but
customer_reviews.text: Had this exact pair for over 7 years no problems. The best polarized quality eye wear you can but. Slightly lower price here than on the Maui Jim website.Keep them protected and you'll have clear vision on any outdoor day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to replace a pair of Persol sunglasses he left in a restaurant. He loves them, says the clarity is far superior to any sunglasses he has had in the past. A total Maui Jim convert! Would highly recommend. Oh, and they look great, too!
customer_reviews.author: BK  Sunny from FL

customer_reviews.title: Best sun glasses on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses! Very effective in reducing glare, and the color transmission is superb. I had an older pair for years - wore them daily and managed to drop them occasionally and/or sit on them. They are tough, attractive, and essential for extended periods in the sun. Still have them as back up. As a semi-pro photographer I can appreciate quality lenses. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Battle

customer_reviews.title: Ultra clear and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Without a doubt the finest sunglasses available.
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalkid

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses so much that this is my third ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses so much that this is my third pair. The other two were "misplaced." They're very durable and look great. I've tried tons of other brands and designs and just can't find any I like nearly as much as these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Polarized Glass Lenses
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim sunglasses aren't cheap, but this is definitely a case of you get what you pay for. After >15 years wearing an earlier version of these Mau Jims, I finally had to buy a new pair. Polarized, and with extremely clear glass lenses and a dark grey tint. Comfortable, and very sharp vision.
customer_reviews.author: CRussel

customer_reviews.title: These are great sunglasses. The lenses are larger than I remember
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses. The lenses are larger than I remember, and was thinking they would be closer in size to my Serengeti Padova glasses. The temple runs a bit longer as well, probably due to the curve of the frame. Other than that, they are very comfortable to the eyes, and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Licenzi

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Ever
customer_reviews.text: No question one of the best pair of sunglasses on the planet .....had maui Jim prescription progressive sunglass lens put in .....would have to say the most optically perfect sunglasses you can get .....and saved over a 100.$$$ on the frames by buying them here !!!!! The frames do facilitate larger melons perfectly !!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 49 and have had many pairs of sunglasses over the years. I life in Phoenix (the valley of the sun), and can say that these are the very best I have EVER owned. This is my second paid. I ran over my last pair... stupid move, but i immediately ordered the same pair again. I can't say enough good about the glasses... they are the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Jpad

customer_reviews.title: Maui Wowee
customer_reviews.text: Have owned many pairs of Maui Jim's. The kahuna have always been my favorite. Look better than the price
customer_reviews.author: Mark Posey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are excellent. It's always a little bit risky to purchase something like sunglasses without trying them on first. However, these are fine, fit well, good quality. I am very pleased with the purchase. They were delivered very timely.
customer_reviews.author: Marty J.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: This product is value for money and package arrived within timeline in good condition. Satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: sudipto bose

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I've had them all.These are the best because they have polycarbonite cpatings and they are very good at avoiding scrathes. And they are beautiful. The polarized tint is excellent. I highy reccomend Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, second pair. They fit my big head without constraints. I have had cataracts and these are good to protect from the UV rays. Wore them instead of the wraparound glasses from the clinic. The doctor approved. Besides, they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Spike's Son

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for years now (lost my last pair) Love the fit and quality, as well as replacement lenses if they break. Highest quality glass with very good polarization. Glad to see the price come down!
customer_reviews.author: Frank & Heather Monahan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair in the last 10 years. I lost alll previous ones. I purchased one from EBay and likely was a fake because the frame was bending a lot. Hope this is not the case.... So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: john shmoo

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Maui Jim Kahuna sunglasses I've owned and are easily the finest product of its kind. My first purchase (copper/bronze) is four years old and in perfect condition. I decided to try the neutral grey lens; my expectations are high and I have not been disappointed. They are very comfortable, scratch resistant and extremely well made. Although relatively expensive, you get what you pay for and are worth the premium price.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim Aviator Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pair of these over the course of about 15 years. I've tried others, but keep coming back to this exact brand and style. Cannot beat the polarization, the quality and look. AND...Amazon's price is fabulous!!! Love, love, love these sunglasses (might be a little heavy for some)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Gilbert-Smitherman

customer_reviews.title: The Big Kahuna
customer_reviews.text: The best sunglasses I have ever owned, and I needed a back up pair after scratching one of the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: terrific sun glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but high quality glass, polarization and frames make Maui Jim my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: TCG

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim shades actually make things more crisp....these are a bit heavy, but a joy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunglasses ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Maui Jim sunglasses. In my opinion they're the "Rolls-Royce" of sunglasses. The pair I just bought was to replace a pair I left in a cab when on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim makes the best polarized glasses on the market
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim makes the best polarized glasses on the market. These are my 5th pair, love em!
customer_reviews.author: don_wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Older technology, but proven. I've worn these for 10 years. They last for ever
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Beck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with these sunglasses - this is actually the second pair of this style that I have owned. Comfortable, durable, and effective - I highly recommend them for outdoor activities, driving, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jbmcclain

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, optics are awesome, excellent build quality, would definetly recommend buying a pair. The are really comfortable too. Price wad ok
customer_reviews.author: J. Abreu

customer_reviews.title: couldn't and still can't believe the great price!
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses arrived much earlier than I expected, couldn't and still can't believe the great price!!! I would absolutely recommend not only Maui Jim sunglasses, but also Amazon, as this transaction was flawless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kdot

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect. You get great protection from the sun and they look really nice I get complements everywhere I go with them on.
customer_reviews.author: albo5256

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought gunmetal/gray aviator Maui Jims as a gift. They are attractive and comfortable. They come with cloth sleeve and hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sunglasses and no issue for slept off my head. The neutral gray was like it is black instead of gray other wise it would given a 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Found these amazon for $50 less than any store. I don't have a large head and these fit perfect. Very good quality sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Cbloom

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloudy and sunny days alike
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim Kahuna - Very high quality. Very stylish. Great for cloudy and sunny days alike. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Glass

customer_reviews.title: It feel really sturdy, the frame doesn't seem to have warped in ...
customer_reviews.text: I own it for more than 6 months now, use it almost daily. It feel really sturdy, the frame doesn't seem to have warped in any way, the joints are still firm. The lenses are very dark, sometimes darker than I would like (specially by sunset, its a bit uncomfortable to drive). No distortions whatsoever. I have managed to drop it several times already, and I got a few dots on the lenses in one of these events, but I'd say the lenses are sturdy as well. My only con is that it is a bit pricy.
customer_reviews.author: purchaser

customer_reviews.title: First pair is at least 5 years old now and has some very fine scratches on the outside lens coating
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these glasses. First pair is at least 5 years old now and has some very fine scratches on the outside lens coating. Otherwise they are still in great shape. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Go fast

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pair of sunglasses I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of sunglasses I have ever had. The company is great, if anything ever happens to them the company fixes them for free or next to nothing. I have lost this pair 2 times and I still buy the exact same pair. They feel great and I feel great when I wear them, this is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jims!  Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Maui Jim Kahuna glasses close to 20 years ago, and held on to them for all that time until two weeks ago. I would not think of buying anything else, brand or style. They are beyond terrific!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Currie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: expensive but worth it - very solid and look great
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great lenses, the glare reduction is excellent and the frames fit perfectly out of the box. A bit pricy though.
customer_reviews.author: MikeHT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot before choosing the Maui Jim Kahuna Sunglasses because they are expensive. We haven't had very much sunny weather yet but so far I am impressed. Everything in view seems sharp and clear. These sunglasses feel light enough while wearing them, they are attractive, and the size fits my face. The acid test will be out in the sun, while driving, or at the beach. Am very happy right now and I love the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Maui Jim
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses! Maui Jim's are always quality and really last. Also, once you go with polarized lenses you will never go to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: empas82

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the same glasses from Maui Jim. After somewhere close to 25 years the earpiece broke at the hinge. They are the best. Maui jim sent me replacement nose pads about 3 years ago at no charge. This pair has improved lenses over my old old glasses. They are very dark for out door sports and recreation. I have epxosed my eyes to too much UV over the years so I need maximum protection which these provide. Colors are true with the gray lenses. One of the best all around products I have owned from an outstanding manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Brad | San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of these glasses. The design is just superb. The weight on these glasses feels real nice. I haven't had a chance to really were it yet since I need prescription lenses fitted in. The only thing left is to see the quality of the prescription lenses fitted in by Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: MeanGreenGiant

customer_reviews.title: Long overdue purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new glasses!! It had been almost 20 years since I had my first pair. I lost those while on vacation and never had a chance to get another pair. So glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glasses, this my 4th pair since they came out. Wouldn’t wear anything else 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic maui jims
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He has had this style for 5 years. His old pair has been dropped and worn almost nonstop. Got him a new pair for Christmas. He retired the old pair to the box, but he kept them for emergencies. They are still good. Maui Jims are very well made and the polarized lenses are the best. They are not flimsy like some sunglasses. This style is classic. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lbarefoot

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: These are very high end sun glasses. Extremely well made and comfortable to wear. The lenses are outstanding. Nobody beats Maui Jim for price performance, warranty and customer service. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Left Lens creaks and is loose
customer_reviews.text: My first pair were great..,however these I will be returning because the left lens creaks when I put them on because it is loose...too expensive not to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim Kahuna Gunmetal/Neutral Grey Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Some eight years ago was the last time I owned a pair of Maui Jim sunglasses. I have owned some very good brands in the past but decided again to choose Maui Jim and the type I chose was Maui Jim Kahuna. My opinions are: PROS: Clarity - 5 Star Fit - 5 Star Styling - 5 Star Polarization - 5 Star CONS: I couldn't find any and believe me I'm fussy. 100% satisfaction with the sunglasses and the service from HDO Sport and Amazon. Thank you. A happy Aussie.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!
customer_reviews.text: These babies are bad to the bone. Even though they are glass lenses, they are definitely not heavy. Great for bigger faces/heads!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT OPTICS!! PRICE IS INLINE WITH EYE COMFORT AND PROTECTION

customer_reviews.text: If you want a quality pair of sun glasses; I highly recommended this product.

Definitely not worth the money I paid on amazon, I ordered another pair from Maui Jim directly.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have to go to Hawaii to get these Maui Jims

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!

customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim glasses are in a league of their own. These are my favorite pair. They are sturdy and comfortable. Worth every penny!

product_meta.title: Maui Jim mens Kahuna Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: The Kahuna frames have been a Maui Jim bestseller for more than 15 years, and for good reason. Made from lightweight, durable SuperThin Glass and available in multiple different polarized lens colors, these rectangular sunglasses are always a safe bet.
feature_bullets: Lenses feature PolarizedPlus 2 technology, which eliminates reflective, direct, and bounce-back glare
Designed for driving and general use, the SuperThin lens are 20% thinner than conventional laminated glass lens
CLEARSHELL scratch-resistant coating shields the lens against scratches
